description: Bhopal, July 7 (ANI): Youth Congress activists on Tuesday staged a protest against the Madhya Pradesh Government with regard to the Vyapam scam.
title: Vyapam scam: Youth Congress activists stage protest in Bhopal
title_page: Vyapam scam: Youth Congress activists stage protest in Bhopal
text:
Bhopal, July 7 (ANI): Youth Congress activists on Tuesday staged a protest against the Madhya Pradesh Government with regard to the Vyapam scam.
Meanwhile, the Supreme Court has agreed to hear a petition against Madhya Pradesh Governor Ram Naresh Yadav to ensure a fair inquiry into the Vyapam scam.
The matter is scheduled to be heard on July 9.
The Vyapam scam involved the Madhya Pradesh Professional Examination Board or Vyapam, which holds the exams for positions like medical officers, constables, teachers and auditors for government departments.
The candidates allegedly bribed government officials to make it to the list of those who cleared the test. (ANI)
